description:
Are you ready to discover strange secrets of our world? Check this DLC researching mythological creatures and exploring mysterious places from ancient and modern times!

Features:
-Over 130 new log entries in Quizpedia: Mythical Creatures and Mysterious Places - each with original and exceptional illustrations.
-4 new chapters in Campaign mode.
-New questions in Tournament and Quick Play modes, including over 300 trivia questions.
-New atmospheric soundtrack to boost the air of mystery.
name: Planet Quiz: Mystery & Myth DLC
